item.title: Help with this code
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

 public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int previousDamage) {
  c.previousDamage = damage;
  boolean fullVeracsEffect = c.getPA().fullVeracs() && Misc.random(3) == 1;
  if (Server.npcHandler.npcs.HP - damage < 0) { 
   damage = Server.npcHandler.npcs.HP;
  }
  }

Show me the code above it.

item.title: Help with this code
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

rash:

You need a } for every {[/quote][quote=“rash, post:2, topic:380707”]You need a } for every {

ok thanks, so would this make it work

}

public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int previousDamage) {
c.previousDamage = damage;
boolean fullVeracsEffect = c.getPA().fullVeracs() && Misc.random(3) == 1;
if (Server.npcHandler.npcs.HP - damage < 0) {
damage = Server.npcHandler.npcs.HP;
}
}

item.title: Help with this code
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

I’m getting the 100 compile error and know its meant to be due to a missing bracket but not sure how to fix. Any help appreciated.

}

public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int previousDamage) {
c.previousDamage = damage;
boolean fullVeracsEffect = c.getPA().fullVeracs() && Misc.random(3) == 1;
if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP - damage < 0) {
damage = Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP;
}
